summary: This is an email auto-reply from an individual involved in the trial of United States v. Epstein, indicating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for immediate assistance related to the case.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge over the trial of United States v. Epstein, referenced as 'the Honorable Ronnie Abrams' in the email auto-reply.

persons.name: AUSAMMI
persons.context: Contact provided for immediate assistance in connection with United States v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: AUSP
persons.context: Contact provided for all other matters not related to the immediate Epstein case.

connections.description: Judge Abrams is presiding over the trial where AUSAMMI is a prosecutor handling the Epstein case.

events.title: Email Auto-Reply During Trial
events.description: An individual involved in United States v. Epstein sets an email auto-reply stating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.

keyFacts: The email is an auto-reply dated August 27, 2019, from someone involved in the criminal trial United States v. Epstein (case number 19 Cr. 490 (RMB)).
The trial is being presided over by Judge Ronnie Abrams.
Immediate assistance for the Epstein case should be directed to AUSAMMI, while other matters go to AUSP.
